data.text: @noirbettie @theJupe I didn’t recognize him once in person- which delighted him- because he was in disguise https://t.co/4CfdYKiAHd
@theJupe @oslowe I believe he is brownish? In the hair region?

@noirbettie JTFB is a real condition that Annika lives with since she was diagnosed in 2002. Do you or your loved ones suffer? You might not know- he was mostly a character actor for a while there. Maybe you thought he was Ron Livingston. Ask your doctor if you might have a JTFB condition. https://t.co/SlTKXl5AVE
(Reminder that I have met him multiple times. AND YET.)
